mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG ( msg_seq, user_id, msg_recv_id, msg_cont, reg_dt, msg_read_yn, msg_sdel_yn, msg_rdel_yn ) VALUES ( msg_seq.nextVal, #{userId}, #{msgRecvId}, #{msgCont}, SYSDATE, '읽지않음', '0', '0' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MSG WHERE msg_seq = #{msgSeq} AND msg_sdel_yn = '1' AND msg_rdel_yn = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE MSG SET MSG_SDEL_YN = '1' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MSG_SDEL_YN = '0'
UPDATE MSG SET MSG_RDEL_YN = '1' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MSG_RDEL_YN = '0'
UPDATE MSG SET MSG_RDEL_YN = '1' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND MSG_READ_YN = '읽지않음' AND MSG_RDEL_YN = '0'
UPDATE MSG SET MSG_READ_YN = '읽음' WHERE msg_seq = #{msgSeq} AND MSG_READ_YN = '읽지않음'
mapper.select: SELECT msg_seq, user_id, msg_recv_id, msg_cont, reg_dt, msg_read_yn, msg_sdel_yn, msg_rdel_yn FROM MSG WHERE NOT (msg_sdel_yn = 1 and msg_rdel_yn = 1) AND msg_seq = #{msgSeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MSG WHERE msg_recv_id = #{msgRecvId} AND msg_rdel_yn = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM MSG WHERE msg_recv_id = #{msgRecvId} AND msg_read_yn = '읽지않음' AND msg_rdel_yn = '0'

SELECT msg_seq, user_id, msg_recv_id, msg_cont, reg_dt, msg_read_yn, msg_sdel_yn, msg_rdel_yn FROM MSG WHERE NOT (msg_sdel_yn = 1 and msg_rdel_yn = 1) AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY MSG_READ_YN DESC, REG_DT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MSG SET MSG_SDEL_YN = '1' WHERE msg_seq = #{msgSeq} AND MSG_SDEL_YN = '0'
UPDATE MSG SET MSG_RDEL_YN = '1' WHERE msg_seq = #{msgSeq} AND MSG_RDEL_YN = '0'
UPDATE MSG SET MSG_RDEL_YN = '1' WHERE msg_seq = #{msgSeq} AND MSG_RDEL_YN = '0' AND MSG_READ_YN = '읽지않음'
mapper.select: SELECT X.*,Y.* FROM( SELECT T.MSG_SEQ AS msgSeq, T.USER_ID AS userId, T.MSG_RECV_ID AS msgRecvId, T.MSG_CONT AS msgCont, TO_CHAR(T.REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS regDt, T.MSG_READ_YN AS msgReadYn, T.MSG_SDEL_YN AS msgSdelYn, T.MSG_RDEL_YN AS msgRdelYn, T.RNUM AS NO FROM( SELECT HR.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MSG_READ_YN DESC , REG_DT DESC ) AS RNUM FROM MSG HR WHERE MSG_RDEL_YN = 0 AND MSG_RECV_ID = #{userId} )T WHERE rnum BETWEEN (10 * (1-1)+1) AND (10 * (1-1)+10) )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM MSG hr WHERE MSG_RDEL_YN = 0 AND MSG_RECV_ID = #{userId} )Y
